service_depreciation_detection_sensibili.title: Ezviz Detection sensitivity service is being removed
service_depreciation_detection_sensibili.description: Ezviz Detection sensitivity service is deprecated and will be removed in Home Assistant 2023.8; Please adjust the automation or script that uses the service and select submit below to mark this issue as resolved.
